amendment.description: To create a point of order against increasing mandatory spending in appropriations bills.

vote.text: Amendment SA 638 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 638 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S3686-3687; text: CR S3686-3687) To create a point of order against increasing mandatory spending in appropriations bills.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 638 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Gregg.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 638 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
